duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform record organization and transcription of orders by completing necessary forms and requisitions.
Assist in planning, organizing, implementing, and evaluating the activities occurring in the nursing station.
Perform clerical and receptionist duties using multiple phone and computer applications.
Maintain the physical environment of the area and order office supplies, replacement supplies for equipment, and informational materials.
Respond to and prioritize patient and family inquiries in a professional manner and coordinate interpreter services as needed.
Be temporarily assigned to an area throughout Akron Children’s Hospital enterprise based on patient needs requiring similar knowledge and skill.

education_certification.credential: Heartsaver AED required within 90 days of employment
